name: CHILDREN'S REHABILITATION CENTER, INC., Appellant, v. BUTLER COUNTY, MH/MR PROGRAM, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Public Welfare
name_abbreviation: Children's Rehabilitation Center, Inc. v. Butler County

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE, and MONTEMURO, JJ.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
parties: CHILDREN’S REHABILITATION CENTER, INC., Appellant, v. BUTLER COUNTY, MH/MR PROGRAM, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Public Welfare.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Robert J. Sugarman, Sugarman & Associates and Alan M. Kaplan, Philadelphia, for appellant.
John A. Kane, Chief Counsel, Jason W. Manne, Dept. of Public Welfare, Frank, P. Krizner, Butler County Sol., for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
648 A.2d 776
CHILDREN’S REHABILITATION CENTER, INC., Appellant, v. BUTLER COUNTY, MH/MR PROGRAM, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Public Welfare.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 22, 1994.
Decided Oct. 12, 1994.
Reargument Denied Nov. 28, 1994.
Robert J. Sugarman, Sugarman & Associates and Alan M. Kaplan, Philadelphia, for appellant.
John A. Kane, Chief Counsel, Jason W. Manne, Dept. of Public Welfare, Frank, P. Krizner, Butler County Sol., for appellees.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE, and MONTEMURO, JJ.
